suitable_for: CEO, VIP, High-end Brands, Jewelry, Law

background.instruction: Dark solid background (Black, Navy, Dark Grey).

decor.instruction: Gold/Silver foil effect lines. Minimalist placement (borders or one diagonal line).

generative_rules.layout: Center aligned or Left aligned with massive whitespace.

shapes.instruction: Abstract geometric shapes (circles/pills) on the edges.

generative_rules.layout: Asymmetric. Allow space for QR code if needed.

accent.instruction: A single colored bar (top, bottom, or side). Thickness: 20-50px.

generative_rules.typography: Focus on strong, clean fonts. No distractions.
